channel.title: Serendipitous Oulipo Haiku
channel.description: Generated haikus based on the serendipitous-oulipo-haiku project

item.title: in the mossy dusk
item.description:
in the mossy dusk
you are like honey and light
with all of your heart

item.title: the seven of them
item.description:
the seven of them
in one sedum, young to old
western wood-peewee

item.title: the seven of them
item.description:
the seven of them
as a Bee is to flower
iterated views

item.title: sunflowers bow their
item.description:
sunflowers bow their
and find they are but water
hundreds of years old

item.title: some of us are those
item.description:
some of us are those
I see you and your colors
waiting for sunset

item.title: little winter bee
item.description:
little winter bee
a permission slip to be
glitches in water

item.title: gratitude sneaks up
item.description:
gratitude sneaks up
too far ahead of your path
with grains of pollen

item.title: repose beneath sky
item.description:
repose beneath sky
too far ahead of your path
transforming in growth

item.title: the weight of a cloud
item.description:
the weight of a cloud
droplets, the bubbles in air
have ever loved me

item.title: the color palettes
item.description:
the color palettes
always reaching to the west
due to gratitude

item.title: the outline of death
item.description:
the outline of death
in fall you came, but no more
relax your creases

item.title: I keep company
item.description:
I keep company
I thought you might sit with me
with grains of pollen

item.title: my luck dragon came
item.description:
my luck dragon came
through my entire being
covered in passion

item.title: the most open paths
item.description:
the most open paths
to manifest silver clouds
charcoal to paper

item.title: I just glimpsed the light
item.description:
I just glimpsed the light
of dancing curves of sunshine
ablutions from sky

item.title: breadcrumbs of sunbeams
item.description:
breadcrumbs of sunbeams
constructed with four circles
in my coffee cup

item.title: I saw the sunrise
item.description:
I saw the sunrise
earlier now. Lets us know
breath in this wildwood

item.title: untangling this mess
item.description:
untangling this mess
pack them like bijou trinkets
at the shore of soul

item.title: there you are, my hawk
item.description:
there you are, my hawk
make this icosahedron
to find what is deep

item.title: faint little circle
item.description:
faint little circle
upon a forest by sea
envelope my eyes

item.title: plot the Devil’s Curve
item.description:
plot the Devil’s Curve
origami creases you
filtered solar light

item.title: thank you my river
item.description:
thank you my river
through my entire being
and then sweep away

item.title: The structure of you
item.description:
The structure of you
in your layers as they fall
warmth from radiance

item.title: The structure of you
item.description:
The structure of you
come to hold my hand, farewell
utterly selfless

item.title: you know you must go
item.description:
you know you must go
the skeletal curvature
revealing true form

item.title: oh, how you long to
item.description:
oh, how you long to
accidental flushing dog
joyful perfection

item.title: I saw you today
item.description:
I saw you today
and find they are but water
to be here and now

item.title: I breathed alder air
item.description:
I breathed alder air
that hug me; sitting so small
air, to tree, to air

item.title: to be a raven
item.description:
to be a raven
and I will love every
what currents we make

item.title: you reach down into
item.description:
you reach down into
paint the histories of tides
so wondrously new

item.title: the silver lining
item.description:
the silver lining
for receding from my path
you just have to look

item.title: a swallow ballet
item.description:
a swallow ballet
revealing ancient forest
have ever loved me

item.title: do you like to think
item.description:
do you like to think
I will reach with all my time
like old memories

item.title: the weight of a cloud
item.description:
the weight of a cloud
together in flight and tree
days, loops, through the years

item.title: so, obviously
item.description:
so, obviously
you peek over the grapes to
absolute beauty

item.title: play brings character
item.description:
play brings character
I see you and your colors
glorious — alone

item.title: winter sun gives hints
item.description:
winter sun gives hints
to the heights that you take wing
to start to become

item.title: even the strongest
item.description:
even the strongest
to a gratitude’s ocean
paths, trails of wonder

item.title: you ensure the life
item.description:
you ensure the life
break free from these tangled limbs
of growth and decay

item.title: sometimes luminance
item.description:
sometimes luminance
there’s hundreds of finish lines
a vibrant puddle

item.title: you were in my hands
item.description:
you were in my hands
the dunes of me — parallel
brightening shadows

item.title: coding with patterns
item.description:
coding with patterns
are but loops in the garment
of an inner light

item.title: ink can be messy
item.description:
ink can be messy
come to hold my hand, farewell
charcoal to paper

item.title: somehow blooms do form
item.description:
somehow blooms do form
found in every little
drops encompass me

item.title: this path is flooded
item.description:
this path is flooded
to truly reflect on you
when you get to peak

item.title: sometimes luminance
item.description:
sometimes luminance
for being steadfast, constant
of your consciousness

item.title: autumn calls us all
item.description:
autumn calls us all
on dead branches among clouds
of growth beneath soil

item.title: when I banished you
item.description:
when I banished you
silences itself only
view of this wonder

item.title: what seems like chaos
item.description:
what seems like chaos
place them in your mind’s pocket
living in circles

item.title: a Fermat spiral
item.description:
a Fermat spiral
with strokes of grass and azure
beauty in my home

item.title: I treat my tea bag
item.description:
I treat my tea bag
plant me beside, beneath one
our reality

item.title: there is a pulse here
item.description:
there is a pulse here
will still have footsteps of light
to be a focus

item.title: my orchid’s face me
item.description:
my orchid’s face me
a thousand poems of you
leap up to kiss sky

item.title: the sea leaves presents
item.description:
the sea leaves presents
I fly with all of them that
that stands still and dark

item.title: be the blank canvas
item.description:
be the blank canvas
get lost in thought and dream big
a precious orchid

item.title: grab the sky and loam
item.description:
grab the sky and loam
orchid blooming for a year
only roots remain

item.title: swimming in a sea
item.description:
swimming in a sea
has become an impetus
places for quiet

item.title: the currents of geese
item.description:
the currents of geese
immersing in the moment
drops encompass me

item.title: oh, oyster catcher
item.description:
oh, oyster catcher
gulping berries at sun set
reflect and renew

item.title: “it’s the hill your on”
item.description:
“it’s the hill your on”
swiftly move with such volume
together a seed

item.title: you gather yourself
item.description:
you gather yourself
in the rain beneath this sky
shoot; despite ourselves

item.title: do you ever just
item.description:
do you ever just
my precious chickadee-dee
in this existence

item.title: I feel all the strands
item.description:
I feel all the strands
closest to the sun today
one drop fills my soul

item.title: brace yourself here; now
item.description:
brace yourself here; now
lead you to the horizon
and create you own

item.title: long shadows pull me
item.description:
long shadows pull me
that provide us with brilliance
joyfully alive

item.title: as you look down here
item.description:
as you look down here
changing, growing, condensing
puddle of raindrops

item.title: I breath in and out
item.description:
I breath in and out
so they could all see this bird
at the oceans breath

item.title: in my cup, coffee
item.description:
in my cup, coffee
lift into the sky above
breath in this wildwood

item.title: like the heat bubble
item.description:
like the heat bubble
together, watching the birds
with your fluff and stance

item.title: a new path is found
item.description:
a new path is found
together in flight and tree
iota of life

item.title: I picture myself
item.description:
I picture myself
from life that I did not know
little chickadee

item.title: your life has texture
item.description:
your life has texture
moments learning the flowers
absolute beauty

item.title: do we flock like Boids?
item.description:
do we flock like Boids?
I fly with all of them that
positive? a shift

item.title: what seems like chaos
item.description:
what seems like chaos
infinite, ever-changing
beauty does abound

item.title: let yourself be here
item.description:
let yourself be here
of all in the past/future
of another Earth

item.title: oh, yes, this is it!
item.description:
oh, yes, this is it!
to run, prance through life’s meadows,
yet, still tread lightly

item.title: even in our death
item.description:
even in our death
before you can grow; anew
Pisano petals

item.title: I found you — fallen
item.description:
I found you — fallen
flow through the ocean of sky
beyond what we grasp

item.title: hello my deer friend
item.description:
hello my deer friend
earlier now. Lets us know
to bridge within you

item.title: the fractals of us
item.description:
the fractals of us
with strokes of grass and azure
warmth from radiance

item.title: gossamer catches
item.description:
gossamer catches
creative, curious, joy
vivid silouettes

item.title: on a walkabout
item.description:
on a walkabout
generations green and full
hundreds of years old

item.title: do we flock like Boids?
item.description:
do we flock like Boids?
of flight above all of it
that small piece of moss

item.title: at the tops of hills
item.description:
at the tops of hills
arcs of me, of time — being
an aerie of grace

item.title: do we flock like Boids?
item.description:
do we flock like Boids?
that surrounds us all, will grow
of another Earth

item.title: I breathed alder air
item.description:
I breathed alder air
together in solitude
to keep it secure

item.title: we run the same paths
item.description:
we run the same paths
quivering with their cuteness
heaven and the Earth

item.title: plot the Devil’s Curve
item.description:
plot the Devil’s Curve
that make you feel like you’re on
in the winter sun

item.title: so, obviously
item.description:
so, obviously
it was always here — ready
to be here and now

item.title: I hugged my mother
item.description:
I hugged my mother
lead you to the horizon
of that great distance

item.title: you asked permission
item.description:
you asked permission
with the magnitude of life
in the winter sun

item.title: the outline of death
item.description:
the outline of death
the silhouettes that reveal
I have passed this past

item.title: unfold at sunrise
item.description:
unfold at sunrise
but drops — collecting, dripping
are manifested

item.title: dynamic systems
item.description:
dynamic systems
and find they are but water
beautiful — complex

item.title: you reach for the moon
item.description:
you reach for the moon
I see you and your colors
I awake in grace

item.title: light offers shadows
item.description:
light offers shadows
in the cracks beneath my feet
no matter the seas

item.title: when is it, you ask
item.description:
when is it, you ask
vector fields of stick and cloth
trailing a mother

item.title: sometimes you just run
item.description:
sometimes you just run
lift into the sky above
at your ocean’s edge

item.title: lofty sequoia
item.description:
lofty sequoia
release the grip that it has
of what surrounds you

item.title: vestiges of trees
item.description:
vestiges of trees
we may spring forth foliage
listening to birds

item.title: you are potential
item.description:
you are potential
perfect, beautiful flowers
cobbles at high tide

item.title: and when you suffer
item.description:
and when you suffer
that you store your quietness
is there really up?

item.title: this hug was intense
item.description:
this hug was intense
seize those moments that make you
ruffles in our time

item.title: beauty in my mind
item.description:
beauty in my mind
for the hidden forest doors
as the darkness came

item.title: repose beneath sky
item.description:
repose beneath sky
of flight above all of it
the awe of it all

item.title: I am condensate
item.description:
I am condensate
will still have footsteps of light
of branches and roots

item.title: in just one moment
item.description:
in just one moment
together like wolves that howl
ready to unfurl

item.title: the base of thirteen
item.description:
the base of thirteen
reflecting from this good earth
into me, not me

item.title: we all can transform
item.description:
we all can transform
turbulence with breath, movement
remember the sky

item.title: oh, yes, this is it!
item.description:
oh, yes, this is it!
may bring forth fruits beyond us
a precious orchid
